columns.ts_code: 股票代码, stock code（字符串类型）, SQL alias ts_code
columns.trade_date: 交易日期, trade date,（YYYY-MM-DD格式的字符串类型）, SQL alias trade_date
columns.close_point: 收盘价, close point,（浮点类型）, SQL alias close_point
columns.open_point: 开盘价, open point,（浮点类型）, SQL alias open_point
columns.high_point: 最高价, high point of the date,（浮点类型）, SQL alias high_point
columns.low_point: 最低价, low point of the date,（浮点类型）, SQL alias low_point
columns.pre_close: 前收盘价, pre close point,（浮点类型）, SQL alias pre_close
columns.change_point: 涨跌点, change points in one date,（浮点类型）, SQL alias change_point）
columns.pct_change: 涨跌幅, percent of change in one date,（浮点类型）,SQL  alias pct_change
columns.vol: 成交量, volume in one date,（浮点类型）, SQL alias vol
columns.amount: 成交额, trade amount in one date ,（浮点类型）, SQL alias amount
columns.vwap: 加权平均价, volume weighted average price,（浮点类型）, SQL alias vwap
columns.turnover_ratio: 换手率, turn over ratio,（浮点类型）, SQL alias turnover_ratio
columns.total_mv: 总市值, total market value,（浮点类型）, SQL alias total_mv
columns.pe: 市盈率, Price Earnings Ratio,（浮点类型）, SQL alias pe
columns.pb: 市净率, Price-to-Book Ratio,（浮点类型）, SQL alias pb

columns.ts_code: 股票代码，数据类型为字符串
columns.name: 股票名称，数据类型为字符串，可为空
columns.enname: 股票英文名称，或者全称，数据类型为字符串
columns.classify: 股票分类，数据类型为字符串
columns.list_date: 上市日期，数据类型为字符串
columns.delist_date: 退市日期，数据类型为字符串，可为空

common_queries.question: 花旗银行 2024年12月15日到 2024年12月16日的交易
common_queries.sql:
select * 
from indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_daily
where ts_code = 'C' AND 
trade_date>= '20241215' and 
trade_date <='20241216' 
order by trade_date desc

common_queries.question: 花旗银行 2024年10月15日到 2024年12月16日之间的平均收益率
common_queries.sql:
select avg(pct_change)
from indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_daily
where ts_code = 'C' AND 
trade_date>= '20241015' and 
trade_date <='20241216'

common_queries.question: 花旗银行 这个股票的英文名称，股票分类和上市日期
common_queries.sql:
select enname, classify, list_date from indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_basic
where ts_code = 'C'

common_queries.question: show me the trade date and top 3 pct change of Citi between 2022/12/15 to 2024/12/31, please append its english name,股票分类和上市日期 as well
common_queries.sql:
SELECT us.trade_date, us.pct_change, ub.enname, ub.classify, ub.list_date 
FROM indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_daily AS us 
INNER JOIN 
(SELECT * FROM indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_basic WHERE ts_code = 'C') AS ub ON us.ts_code = ub.ts_code 
WHERE us.ts_code = 'C' AND us.trade_date BETWEEN '20221215' AND '20241231' 
ORDER BY us.pct_change DESC LIMIT 3

business_rules: 花旗银行的 ts_code 是'C'
close price is the same as close_point
indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_daily 和 indexsysdb.df_tushare_us_stock_basic 的join key 是ts_code
图标就是plot, scatter chart, line chart
